election_record.label: New Jersey 1810 U.S. Senate

overview.note: "On nomination for Senator of the United States were John Linn, Nathan Stout, Henry Southard, John Condit and William Coxe. The names of the different candidates were all withdrawn by the persons who had put them on nominations, except that of John Condit, the present incumbent, who was re-appointed for the ensuing six years." The True American and Commercial Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA). November 9, 1810.

election_record.reference: The True American and Commercial Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA). November 9, 1810.
